      • formatISO8601DateTimestamp

        public static java.lang.String formatISO8601DateTimestamp(java.util.Date date,
                                                          boolean isTimestamp)
        Gets a date formatted in ISO 8601 date time format. If the date is null, returns null.
        Parameters:
        date - the date to be formatted
        isTimestamp - if the value should be parsed using the ISO8601DateTime or ISO8601Date format
        Returns:
        String, date in ISO 8601 date time format
